This isn't really a crossover. If we actually were RPing wrestlers then it would be a crossover. Of course that would never be allowed. We just decided to base some things from wrestling related stuff. Everyone who creates a character has to base it from something or somewhere. And quite frankly the nWo is the most creative thing going on in NBW right now.

Sincerely, 
nWo

******************************************************************
The preceding has been paid for by the 
New World Order

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: aerosmith60@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 10:29 PM
  Subject: NWO


  ooc: i realize the faction could become as good as any other one out there. Hell  mine is still very young and devolping. The only thing is I just dont like the fact having wreslting brought into the rpg. I remmeber when i gave a few hints to have a lil dbz brought in o heck no i got cut off in a second. I ebtually figured out why yanshosh didnt want it. Just I wont speak out about this again I just think we should stick with beast wars and not allow any crossovers. It makes people become creative. 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
              ADVERTISEMENT
             
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


--Boundary_(ID_8QOgZ8hB7ZC9FYLib3E+Fw)
